item.title: Age is just a number!
item.description: Experience is what matters, we all grow, little by little each day, but not because we grow older physically. It's not the age, that make us older, it is the experience we all have every day. This blog post is about Experiences. Naruto, he grew a little more. SUSE package hub project, even though, I didn't have much of the practical experience on the project of packaging, but still I had a lot more to learn.
